name: Edges
description:
Edges is a small fast paced game where you control a snake-like player on its path. The catch is in traps that are standing on its way - you have to move left or right to avoid them. Your player moves on its own and all you have to do is control its jumps left or right.

LEVELS:
Levels in this game are put together and they are visible in the difficulty of gameplay. The further you get - the harder levels are. The faster you move - the better your chances of success are.

Traps include obstacles and loops, if you avoid all of them - you're at the edge!
